analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: Kāmānametaṁ nissaraṇaṁ yadidaṁ nekkhammaṁ, rūpānametaṁ nissaraṇaṁ yadidaṁ āruppaṁ, yaṁ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ nirodho tassa nissaraṇaṁ—
analyzed: kāmānam etam nissaraṇam yat idam nekkhamma rūpānam etam nissaraṇam yat idam āruppa yam kho pana kiñci bhūtam saṅkhatam paṭiccasamuppannam nirodho tassa nissaraṇa

original: imā kho, bhikkhave, tisso nissaraṇiyā dhātuyo”ti.
analyzed: imāḥ kho bhikkhave tissaḥ nissaraṇiyāḥ dhātuyaḥ ti
sa veḥ yoga atigaḥ muni iti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
